{{Infobox dungeon |name = Old Chateau |image = [[File:Old Chateau.png|300px]] |caption = An outside view of the Old Chateau. |tokens = 52,500 |location = West of Route 205. }} The '''Old Chateau''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. ==Pok√©mon and Dungeon Stats== {| class="wikitable" |- !
